abstract: Brian Seibert reviews dance program Ache: Lavagem da Rua, featuring roster of ethnic dances to celebrate 50th anniversary of Immigration and Nationality Act of 1965, at Lincoln Center Out of Doors festival.
lead_paragraph: The two Lincoln Center Out of Doors performances highlighted dance and music from a broad range of immigrant cultures in New York City.

headline.main: Review: ‘Heritage Sunday’ and ‘Ache: Lavagem da Rua’ Maintain Culture Through Dance

snippet: The two Lincoln Center Out of Doors performances highlighted dance and music from a broad range of immigrant cultures in New York City.
